activities: Datamann, Inc. is a data processing services provider that provides services to companies, our customers, to manage their customer information on their behalf. Datamann, Inc. does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of it's customers. All such information is owned and/or controller by Datamann, Inc.'s customer. These companies direct Datamann, Inc. via written instructions on how to process their data to meet their objectives.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Privacy program created by Direct Marketing Association quidelines.
recoursemech: All disputes will be handled through the Direct Marketing Association (DMA).
